text: læa phwk khea klaw wa pord wingwxn tx phracea khxng than hı kæ phwk rea dwy theid phraxngkh k ca thrng cæng kæ phwk rea wa waw nan pen xyangri? Mu sa klaw wa thæcring phraxngkh tras wa man pen wawtawmeiy thi mi kæ læa mi saw tæ mixayu kungklang rahwang nan phwk than cng ptibati tam sing thi phwk than thuk chı theid
